name: 陳雅玫
objective: This course is designed to introduce to students basic skills for consecutive interpretation, including note-taking techniques, pre-task preparation, bilingual glossary compiling and knowledge build-up. These skills will not only lay the foundation for more advanced interpreting training but will also be of value in other professions.
